resources.string: You wake up at your bed…
You hear from your room\'s radio that the global pandemic made humans turn into ZOMBIES.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Call somebody for help. 
 2. Go to the kitchen. 
 3. Go back to sleep. 
 4. Go downstairs and look for people around.
It\'s the start of the game and you\'re already dead… You are not good at this.
They kindly help you and let you in their van.
But they made an accident and you are now stranded.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Stay in the car. 
 2. Use your food and look for shelter. 
 3. Fight the zombies. 
 4. Just. Run.
